General.Name: AN2 Therapeutics Inc
General.Description: AN2 Therapeutics, Inc., a clinical-stage biopharmaceutical company, focuses on developing treatments for rare, chronic, and serious infectious diseases. It is developing epetraborole, which is in a pivotal Phase 2/3 clinical trial as a once-daily oral treatment for patients with non-tuberculous mycobacterial lung disease. The company was incorporated in 2017 and is headquartered in Menlo Park, California.
General.Address: 1800 El Camino Real, Menlo Park, CA, United States, 94027
